level.text: When used in this chapter, the following words and phrases shall have the meaning ascribed:
Act – the District of Columbia Taxicab Establishment Act of 1985 as amended (33 D.C. Official Code §§ 50-301 to 50-320 (2001)).
Administrative Procedure Act – the District of Columbia Administrative Procedure Act, as amended (D.C. Official Code §§ 2-501 to 2-511 (2001).
Chairperson – the Chairperson of the Commission, either as a nonvoting member of the Panel or hearing panel; or as the superintendent of the Office.
Commission – the District of Columbia Taxicab Commission established under § 5 of the Act (D.C. Official Code § 50-304 (2001)).
Day – calendar days, unless otherwise expressly defined.
District or D.C. – the District of Columbia.
Hearing Panel – the component of the Panel designated to exercise the Panel’s adjudicatory authority.
Office – the Office of Taxicabs established under § 13 of the Act (D.C. Official Code § 50-312 (2001)).
Panel – the Panel on Adjudication of the Commission, established under § 8(b)(2) of the Act (D.C. Official Code § 50-307(b)(2) (2001)).
Passenger Vehicle for Hire – the same meaning as in § 3(6) of the Act (D.C. Official Code § 50-303(6) (2001)).
Person – every natural person, corporation, association or co-partnership. Secretary – the Secretary to the Panel appointed under § 300.4.
Taxi or Taxicab – the same meaning as in § 3(8) of the Act (D.C. Official Code § 50-303(8) (2001)).
Taxicab Association – the same meaning as in §3(9) of the Act (D.C. Code § 50-303(9) (2001))
Taxi or Taxicab Company – the same meaning as in § 3(10) of the Act (D.C. Official Code § 50-303(10) (2001)).
Taxi or Taxicab Fleet – the same meaning as in § 3(11) of the Act (D.C. Official Code § 50-303(11) (2001)).
Taxi or Taxicab Operator – the same meaning as in § 3(13) of the Act (D.C. Official Code § 50-303(13) (2001)).
Taxi or Taxicab Owner – the same meaning as in § 3(14) of the Act (D.C. Official Code § 50-303(14) (2001)).
APPENDIX 3-1
DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA TAXICAB COMMISSION PANEL ON ADJUDICATION
In the Matter of: Docket Number:
(Print Your Name)
NOTICE OF APPEAL
I give notice of appeal from
(Briefly describe action taken, by whom, and whether
you are appealing all or part of action taken.)
Issued on:
(Date of Order)
WHEREFORE, I request a hearing before the Panel on Adjudication of the District of Columbia Taxicab Commission as provided in its Rules of Organization and Procedure.
(Date) (Sign your name)
(Print your name) (Your mailing address)
(Daytime phone number)
If your are represented by an attorney, indicate below. All future correspondence will be sent to this person.
(Your Attorney’s name)
(Your Attorney’s address)
(Your Attorney’s Phone Number)

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 34 DCR 6751, 6796 (October 23, 1987).
